turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need to order a couple pieces a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One pepperoni pizza and one sausage pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $26, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and will you be dining in, picking up, or having it delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be a take-out.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 35 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
